import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { OrderModel } from 'app/modules/orderhistory/models/Order' import { actions } from '../../redux/OrdersRedux' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { Button, Modal, Form, FormGroup, Input, Label, ModalFooter, ModalHeader, ModalBody } from "reactstrap" import {useDispatch, useSelector, shallowEqual } from 'react-redux' import { RootState } from 'setup' import { Group } from '../../models/Order' type Props = { show: boolean close: () => void } const EditMulti: React.FC = ({ show,close }) => { const role: string = useSelector(({ auth }) => auth.user?.role, shallowEqual) as string || "" const balance: number = useSelector(({ auth }) => auth.user?.balance, shallowEqual) as number || 0 const adding: boolean = useSelector(({ orderhistory }) => orderhistory.adding, shallowEqual) as boolean || false const groups: Group[] = useSelector(({ orderhistory }) => orderhistory.groups, shallowEqual) as Group[] || [] const orders: OrderModel[] = useSelector(({ orderhistory }) => orderhistory.orders, shallowEqual) as OrderModel[] || [] const dispatch = useDispatch() const [maxthreads, setMaxthreads] = useState(100) const [videoid, setVideoid] = useState("") //const [list_video, setList_video] = useState("") // const [view_need, setView_need] = useState(1000) const [premium_rate,setPremium_rate]=useState(5) const [view_percent,setView_percent]=useState(4000) // const [homerate,setHome_rate]=useState(0) const [searchrate,setSearch_rate]=useState(80) const [suggestrate,setSuggest_rate]=useState(0) const [directrate,setDirect_rate]=useState(20) // const [likerate,setLike_rate]=useState(25) const [commentrate,setComment_rate]=useState(25) const [mobilerate,setMobile_rate]=useState(0) const [optionbuff, setOptionbuff] = useState(0) const [note, setNote] = useState("") const [viewstart, setViewstart] = useState(0) const [timebuff, setTimebuff] = useState(4000) // const [enabled,setEnabled]=useState(1) const dismissModal = () => { dispatch(actions.clearcurrentOrder()) } const submit = () => { const arr:string[]=[] orders.forEach(item=>{ if(item.checked==true) arr.push(item.videoid) }) const videoid=arr.join('\n') if (view_need % 100 !== 0 || view_need ==0) { alert("Số sub cần chạy phải chia hết cho 100") return } if(homerate+searchrate+suggestrate+directrate !=100){ alert("Tổng nguồn view không đúng") return } if(likerate>100||likerate<0){ alert("Tỉ lệ like không đúng") return } if(view_percent>10000000||view_percent<0){ alert("phần trăm xem video không đúng") return } if(commentrate>100||commentrate<0){ alert("Tỉ lệ comment không đúng") return } dispatch(actions.editMultiOrderRequest({ videoid, homerate, note, directrate, commentrate, mobilerate, searchrate, enabled, maxthreads, viewstart, likerate, suggestrate, timebuff, optionbuff })) } useEffect(() => { if (!adding) { close() } }, [adding]) return (
Sửa nhiệm vụ

Cài đặt danh sách đơn

Nguồn view tổng = 100%

setHome_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setSearch_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setSuggest_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" type="number" /> setDirect_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" type="number" />

Cài đặt tương tác

setLike_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setComment_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setMobile_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setMaxthreads(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setTimebuff(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" />
setNote(e.target.value)} type="text" />
setOptionbuff(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" type="select" value={optionbuff} > setEnabled(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" type="select" value={enabled} >
) } export default EditMulti
